title: Chapter 1059 - The Enraged Painter
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1059 - The Enraged Painter

The Painter really was stunned. Who is this person?

The founder of the Studio of the Heart was a powerhouse of the distant stars, and his reputation made entire planets tremble.

His position was comparable to that of the leaders of the Nine Heavens Pavilion and the Church of the River of Stars! Yet now, a teenager dared interrupt him and rebuke him, saying his words were… “nonsense”!

It had been a long time since the Painter had experienced this. For a moment, he almost didn’t dare believe it.

Some time passed before he asked, “You’ve seen me before?”

He stood there in clothes whiter than snow, his hands behind his back. Although he was just a trace of remnant will, his dignified, majestic bearing made heaven and earth tremble, and the landscape dimmed by comparison. It was like the descent of an unsurpassed sovereign!

Su Yi took out a jug of wine and drank. He said casually, “Last time, I killed someone called Feng Ji. I saw you then too.”

Imprints of will couldn’t communicate with each other. Even the Painter’s true body couldn’t sense the changes to his imprints of will.

The crux of the matter was that imprints...
